source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_00<tab>Minfilia has another lead for you to pursue.
target: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_00<tab>砂の家のミンフィリアは、冒険者に新たな冒険を頼みたいようだ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_01<tab>According to Minfilia, there has been another potential sighting of Lahabrea in the North Shroud. Speak with the sylph Noraxia for the details.
target: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_01<tab>ミンフィリアの話によると、黒衣森の北部で、アシエンと思しき「仮面の男」が目撃されたらしい。「ノラクシア」から詳しい話を聞こう。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_02<tab>Noraxia tells you that a miner named Medrod witnessed an unsavory masked character in the wood. Take yourself to Fallgourd Float in the North Shroud, and learn all you can from him.
target: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_02<tab>砂の家のノラクシアから「仮面の男」の噂を聞いた。黒衣森・北部森林の「フォールゴウド」にいる山師「メドロド」と話そう。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_03<tab>You find Medrod at Fallgourd Float, but the man is too perturbed to speak of his experience. For want of a better idea, try to /soothe the man.
target: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_03<tab>メドロドはひどく怯えているようだ。フォールゴウドの「メドロド」にエモート「なだめる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_04<tab>Medrod finally settles down and recounts his bloodcurdling experience seeing the masked man, who he swears is death incarnate. As Minfilia mentioned, it appears that this individual is indeed connected to the recent spate of mysterious deaths.
target: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SEQ_04<tab>落ち着いたメドロドに事情を聞いた。「仮面の男」はどうやらこのフォールゴウドで起きている「怪事件」と何かしらの関係があるという。はたして事件とは……？
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_TODO_00<tab>砂の家のノラクシアと話す

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Medrod at Fallgourd Float.
target: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_TODO_01<tab>フォールゴウドのメドロドと話す
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_TODO_02<tab>メドロドに「なだめる」をする

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SYSTEM_100_000受注するには、進行中のメインクエストを破棄する必要があります。
メインコマンドの「コンテンツ情報」から、
「ジャーナル」を選び、破棄してください。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MINFILIA_000_000<tab>While you were tending to business in Thanalan, some new information arrived courtesy of our friends the sylphs.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MINFILIA_000_000さて、アシエンの調査を再開しましょう。
あなたがザナラーンで調査をしている間に、
新たな情報が入ったのよ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MINFILIA_000_001<tab>An individual fitting Lahabrea's description has been sighted in the North Shroud. This sighting comes in the wake of a series of mysterious deaths in the selfsame area. My instincts tell me that our man is involved.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MINFILIA_000_001シルフ族の情報網によると、黒衣森の北部で、
アシエンと思しき「仮面の男」が目撃されたそうよ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MINFILIA_000_002<tab>I would have you continue your investigation where you left off. Twelve willing, we will pick up Lahabrea's trail once more.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MINFILIA_000_002周辺では、怪しい事件も起きてるみたい……。
リトルアラミゴの状況とも一致するし、
「当たり」の可能性は高いわ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MINFILIA_000_003<tab>Noraxia can furnish you with the details. Pray speak with her, and take it from there. As always, be careful out there, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MINFILIA_000_003ノラクシアから詳しい話を聞いたら、
さっそく現地へ向かってちょうだい。
今度こそ、奴らの尻尾を掴みましょう！

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_NORAXIA_000_010<tab>Walking one is to investigate sinister one? Then heed well this one's words.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_NORAXIA_000_010やっと出番なのでふっち？
わたぴが頑張って調べた「ジョウホウ」を、
ありがたく聞くのでふっち。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_NORAXIA_000_011<tab>This one is friends with a walking one in the Ashcrown Consortium. According to friendly one, a digging one named Medrod had an encounter with a scary masked one. This masked one is most certainly sinister one!
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_NORAXIA_000_011わたぴには「アッシュクラウン商会」という、
クリスタル売りのおともだちがいるのでふっち。
その子たちが聞いたお話でふっち。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_NORAXIA_000_012<tab>Walking one should go and speak with digging one Medrod. Digging one is to be found at Fallgourd Float in the North Shroud.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_NORAXIA_000_012フォールゴウドの「メドロド」っていう山師が、
仮面を被ったコワ～イ人に、会ったらしいのでふっち。
きっと、探してる悪い子なのでふっち！

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_020<tab>P-Please leave me be... I'm not long for this world...
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_020なんだよォ……
俺のことは、放っておいてくれよォ……！

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_021<tab>I...I looked death in the face... 'Tis only a matter of time before he comes for me, just like he came for that poor woman...
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_021どうせ俺は死ぬんだ……！
死神を見た奴は、あの女みたいに殺されるんだよォ……！

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SYSTEM_000_022<tab>Medrod is clearly traumatized. Perhaps if you were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soothe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him, he might remain calm for long enough to hold a conversation.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SYSTEM_000_022メドロドはひどく怯えている……。
「メドロド」にエモート「なだめる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_025<tab><sob> Mummyyy! I'm sorry I wasn't a better son! I'm sorry I didn't eat my greens and do my chores! Waaaaaah!
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_025なんで、あんなもの見ちまったんだ……。
うっうっ……親不孝な息子でごめんよ、母ちゃぁぁん……！

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SYSTEM_000_026<tab>Medrod is clearly traumatized. Perhaps if you were to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>soothe<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him, he might remain calm for long enough to hold a conversation.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_SYSTEM_000_026メドロドはひどく怯えている……。
「メドロド」にエモート「なだめる」をしよう。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_060<tab>...Y-You're right. It's not as bad as it seems. I saw something terrible, that's true, but that hardly means I'm going to suffer the same fate. Thanks to you, I can think straight again. I believe I can even recount what I saw without losing it.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_060うっうっ、あんた、いい人だなぁ……。
言われてみれば、俺、殺される理由がねぇや。
ただ、不吉なものを見ただけだ。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_061<tab>It was just another ordinary day. I was headed back to the Float when I noticed a suspicious character in the distance─a masked man garbed head to toe in black. He had a hideous fiend in tow, a winged creature that was all eyeball and jagged teeth. Taken by curiosity, I crept as near as I dared...
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_061忘れもしねぇ、アレは採掘終了の鐘が鳴ったときのことだ。
目玉の化け物を従えた「仮面の男」を見かけたんだ。
不気味に思って、そいつの来た方を見ると……

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_062<tab>...To see the corpse of a woman! One glimpse was enough to tell me that she'd died a gruesome death!
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_062あったんだよ……。
無残に殺された、女の死体がさぁぁぁッ！！
ぎゃぁぁぁッ！！

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_063<tab>In that instant, I knew right away that the masked man was a minion of Thal, come to claim her soul for His realm.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_063……目玉の化け物が出た後には、必ず死体が見つかるんだ。
俺はすぐに悟ったね……
化け物を従えていた「仮面の男」は、死神に違いねぇって！

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_064<tab>What!? You're investigating this same masked man!?
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_064あの「仮面の男」を追っているって！？
……つまりお前は、このフォールゴウドで起きている
怪事件に興味があるんだな！？

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_AIDEEN_000_065<tab>If that's the case, we'll help you in whatever way we can!
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_AIDEEN_000_065そーいうことなら、わたしらに任せてよ！
山師の楽しみときたら、晩酌と無駄話だけなんだから！

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_IVAURAULT_000_065<tab>Aye, anything to ensure that we won't have to suffer Medrod's hysteria ever again.
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_IVAURAULT_000_065まったくです。
メドロドが湿気っていた分、駄弁が溜まっていましてね。

source: TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_066<tab>All right, teamwork! That's what I wanted to─wait, I haven't been <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> bad, have I...? At any rate, I'm all for helping this adventurer. It's the least I can do to repay <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> for comforting me!
target:
TEXT_XXAUSA711_03863_MEDROD_000_066ヘヘッ、お前ら……さすがだぜ！
俺たちで、この親切な冒険者を助けてやろうぜ！！
